Header.title: Welcome To Robson's Bodyworks
Header.paragraph: Expert Care for your Car's Every Need

About.paragraph: Robsons Bodyworks began as a family-run collision shop in the UK in 1999, where Mark and Claire worked together from day one. Their commitment to quality and craftsmanship allowed them to expand globally. In 2008, they moved to Canada and opened their second location in Amherstburg, Ontario. Today, with locations in both the UK and Canada, Robsons Bodyworks continues to provide top-notch vehicle repair services while staying true to the family values that have guided them since the start.

Testimonials.text: "They repaired my vehicle after a deer hit. The process was very easy and fast. I would recommend them to anyone and will definitely use them for any future needs. Thanks for all your help!"
Testimonials.name: Dan D

Testimonials.text: "Incredible place to get your vehicle done! Mark goes the extra mile to make sure he can help you out in any way he can and will make sure the job gets done properly. Easily the best bodyshop in Windsor-Essex!"
Testimonials.name: Mackenzie R

Testimonials.text: "If your looking for one of the best body shops out there, these are the guys. I took a one year old high value vehicle to Robson’s after being rear ended and it came back better than new.  Very professional, friendly  and they does flawless work.  Worth every dollar spent."
Testimonials.name: Rick B

Testimonials.text: "Robsons Bodywork’s does fantastic work down to every detail, never left unimpressed, I was very pleased with my car and it’s phenomenal paint job. Would rate it 10 stars if I could"
Testimonials.name: Bella C

Testimonials.text: "Job well done car looks great, service was excellent, then our door handle broke and he saved me a ton of dough by replacing one part instead of the handle and lock. Recommended for a job well done"
Testimonials.name: Pete K

Testimonials.text: "Honest work, photo evidence of the process available. Flexible with pickup/dropoff scheduling. Fast, high quality work, Robson's isn't the place to cut corners. Highly recommended."
Testimonials.name: Steve S
